ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Self-adaptive Mutation Rates, Novelty Search and CMA-ES
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Oliver, I just wanted to reply briefly that you make some good points.  Like you I m not sure that being smooth is really the issue.  I think the many
